article_title: Is Justice Scalia Suffering From Dementia?
article_text:
Published on Jun 25, 2015

The Supreme Court upheld the subsidy provision in the Affordable Care Act, meaning that millions of Americans will be able to keep their health insurance. Republicans are furious, but its time for them to move on. America’s Lawyer, Mike Papantonio, appears on MSNBC’s The Ed Show alongside Howard Dean and Wendell Potter to talk about the issue. Miss an episode of Ring of Fire? No worries. Click the link to get up: https://www.freespeech.org/collection/ringoffire.
